meanings.definition: To sit or lie in a relaxed or lazy manner.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys lounging on the sofa after a long day.
meanings.sent2: The cat was lounging in the sun, soaking up the warmth.
meanings.sent3: Lounging around all day may sound fun, but it gets boring quickly.
meanings.sent4: As the waves gently rocked the boat, he felt like he was lounging on a cloud.
meanings.sent5: Lounging by the pool, she felt all her worries melt away.
